Job Description:

An experienced (at least 15 years) SRE Lead to work on a critical project for one of our biggest clients in the banking domain. The Individual should be passionate about technology, experienced in developing and managing cutting edge technology applications.

Technical Skills:

\u00b7       Conduct assessments, model reliability for transaction flows

\u00b7       Design Architecture for high availability / reliability

\u00b7       Troubleshooting availability issues

\u00b7       Skills \u2013

  • Technical Architecture, Performance Engineering / Reliability Engineering SME
  • 15+ years overall experience
  • Lateral/Peer leadership skills
  • Experience in production management, performance engineering
  • Experience with implementing monitoring using AppDynamics / DataDog / Prometheus
